Class Gui

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class Gui
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameUi
Represent the core operating class for the GUI for Island Trader
Author:
Jordan Vegar

    When bad weather occurs, creates a screen that tells the player.

    Ends the game and creates the gameOverScreen which gives information on why the game ended and how well the player did.

    When a pirate attack occurs, creates a screen that allows the player to roll a dice to defend against the pirates.

    Creates the coreOptionsScreen from which the player can select which action they would like to do.
    void rescueSailor​(Route route)
    When a sailor is rescued, this method creates a screen to tell the player, and tell them how much money they receive as thanks.

    Creates and shows the setupScreen, in which the user enters their information and makes the choices required to start the game.

    • setup

      public void setup​(GameEnvironment gameEnvironment)
      Creates and shows the setupScreen, in which the user enters their information and makes the choices required to start the game.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      gameEnvironment - GameEnvironment object for the current object

    • playGame

      public void playGame()
      Creates the coreOptionsScreen from which the player can select which action they would like to do.
      Specified by:
      playGame in interface GameUi

    • finishGame

      public void finishGame​(java.lang.String message)
      Ends the game and creates the gameOverScreen which gives information on why the game ended and how well the player did.
      Specified by:
      finishGame in interface GameUi
      Parameters:
      message - String A message that gives a reason for the game ending, to be displayed to the player.

    • pirateAttack

      public void pirateAttack​(Route route)
      When a pirate attack occurs, creates a screen that allows the player to roll a dice to defend against the pirates. Displays the outcome of the attack.
      Specified by:
      pirateAttack in interface GameUi
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when the pirate attack occurred.

    • badWeather

      public void badWeather​(Route route, int damageDone)
      When bad weather occurs, creates a screen that tells the player. Also tells the player how much damage the bad weather did to their ship.
      Specified by:
      badWeather in interface GameUi
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when the bad weather occurred
      damageDone - int The amount of damage the weather dealt to your ship.

    • rescueSailor

      public void rescueSailor​(Route route)
      When a sailor is rescued, this method creates a screen to tell the player, and tell them how much money they receive as thanks.
      Specified by:
      rescueSailor in interface GameUi
      Parameters:
      route - Route The route the player was sailing along when they rescued a sailor occurred
